code: var localStorageKey="bookList";export var getSavedList=function getSavedList(){var localStorageBooks=localStorage.getItem(localStorageKey);return localStorageBooks?JSON.parse(localStorageBooks):[];};export var setList=function setList(results){localStorage.setItem(localStorageKey,JSON.stringify(results));};export var getSavedListDetails=function getSavedListDetails(listName){var localStorageBooks=localStorage.getItem(listName);return localStorageBooks?JSON.parse(localStorageBooks):[];};export var setListDetails=function setListDetails(listName,results){localStorage.setItem(listName,JSON.stringify(results));};
